places.name: Gold's Gym West Broadway
places.address: Gold's Gym West Broadway, 709 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V5Z 1J5

featured_reviews.review_id:
It's a nice gym - one of the best in Vancouver in terms of size and quality of equipment. It's great they have a women's only section that is well equipped.
However the way they get you to join is by pressuring you with deals. They advertise a '3 day free trial' but that's not really true, since you have to have a whole meeting about the gym and prices before you can try it, and then they'll hound you with deals you can only have if you join before working out. I wanted to actually try the gym before committing, but felt really pressured by this meeting (with Farah) and left with a bad taste in my mouth.
I signed up for 3 months to see if it was worth the price (around $72 per month). It's a good gym with lots of equipment and always pretty clean. It's never crazy busy either and other people here are friendly and just focused on their workout. The classes system is confusing as you have to pay extra for some of them and the booking on my app never worked, so I didn't try the classes.

They don't seem to pay much attention to the bathrooms as the women's was frequently out of toilet paper.

Their customer service is only contactable by email and they take over a week to reply, or just don't reply. This is really annoying when you want to freeze your membership or do other things that the front desk can't do.

Overall, I like this gym but they need to change the way they recruit new members. If it was a fixed price a month without all the fees and commitments I would probably stay. But the hassle and pressure isn't worth it for me, I'd rather go to a gym where it's the same price every month and they're not just trying to get your money.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Ellie. We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience with us, we aim to provide a positive experience for all members and guest. We would appreciate the opportunity to improve, but in the case you found a facility that offers you the flexibility you need on a monthly bases - We wish you happy lifting in the months to come!   Please get in touch with us at (604) 620-4653 if you have any questions! Thank you, Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Right as I walked in I was treated with a warm smile and ready for them to help me. I walked in for just a day pass and they took care of it right away. Erika gave me a tour of the facility, very professional and good listener. Overall great facility and equipment. 10/10
featured_reviews.review_text: Right as I walked in I was treated with a warm smile and ready for them to help me. I walked in for just a day pass and they took care of it right away. Erika gave me a tour of the facility, very professional and good listener. Overall great facility and equipment. 10/10
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Roberto. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Gold's Gym West Broadway. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there's anything we can help you with, please don't hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The quality of the gym is ok but the service needs tremendous work!

My wife and I tried cancelling our membership as we are moving to Europe. We gave the necessary proof of moving in regards to the cancellation policy but they charged an extra $300 to my credit card and stopped replying to my emails when I asked why I was charged this.

I guess since we're moving they think I wouldn't pursue this in the local court system. Very sketchy business practice! Be aware!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Interstellar. We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience with us. Please get in touch with us at (604) 620-4653 we will do our best to assist you. Thank you, Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is a great gym.
The staff is very friendly and approachable if you have any questions and feedback on equipment etc.
I would give this gym 4.5 stars only because they are missing a few key pieces of equipment but that's only if your the body builder kinda guy.
But I did talk to them and they are planning on adding those pieces in the next couple years which is why I gave the 5 stars.
One is the pendulum squat machine which is one of the best machines to add on your leg day to really focus on the quads better than any workout you can think of for the quads.
The pendulum squat machine is very difficult to find in any gym so the fact that they're adding it is amazing.
Another is a standing lateral raise machine, Some call it a Watson machine.
Another is the standing T Bar Row, they do have the seated one, but it doesn't put you at the best angle but still workable.
All in all a great gym if you can avoid the busy hours.
Thank you Golds!!!

Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there's anything we can help you with, please don't hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Worst customer service I've ever received. I registered for the free session but after half an hour of showing me the gym, they told me I couldn't use my free session because my address was in North Vancouver. Also, I was asked for so much personal information during the showing that was so weird, never had this experience before. The prices were so out of the mind. I've been to Gold'a gym in other states it was good but this disappointed me in Gold's gym. Do not recommend it at all.
featured_reviews.review_text: Worst customer service I've ever received. I registered for the free session but after half an hour of showing me the gym, they told me I couldn't use my free session because my address was in North Vancouver. Also, I was asked for so much personal information during the showing that was so weird, never had this experience before. The prices were so out of the mind. I've been to Gold'a gym in other states it was good but this disappointed me in Gold's gym. Do not recommend it at all.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, Amirmohammad. We are sorry you did not enjoy your experience at our facility. Our team does its best to get to know every guest that walks into the club and ask the right questions to understand your personal fitness needs. Our pricing directly reflects the quality and upkeep of our equipment, but may not compare other lower cost facilities in the area. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you find the facility that works best for you!  Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: I was in Vancouver for a week last month and signed up for a weekly membership at Gold's. Their team was very friendly and it was a fantastic experience. I used the facility daily and had excellent workouts. They have some great equipment, a wide range of free weights and lots of machines. Highly recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text: I was in Vancouver for a week last month and signed up for a weekly membership at Gold's. Their team was very friendly and it was a fantastic experience. I used the facility daily and had excellent workouts. They have some great equipment, a wide range of free weights and lots of machines. Highly recommend.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Richard. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Best thing about this gym is the people.The staff are great and the members are friendly.I have a few quibbles such as the lack of a juice bar or even so much as a vending machine. BYO everything. Also dislike hand blowers in washrooms which are germ dispersal units. Equipment is good, I would like to see a tibia raise machine but you ca'n't  have everything. There should be more sets of the most popular dumb bells (25-45 lbs) These are small quibbles though and the facility is top notch.
featured_reviews.review_text: Best thing about this gym is the people.The staff are great and the members are friendly.I have a few quibbles such as the lack of a juice bar or even so much as a vending machine. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Reed. Your feedback is highly appreciated. We are happy to request some smaller size dumbbells.  Thank you so much for the review! - Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Overall this is a great gym. New machines and nice equipment. I even tried some personal training. The main issue with this location is it's too small. I go in the morning to avoid the crowds and even then I have to wait to use the equipment.
featured_reviews.review_text: Overall this is a great gym. New machines and nice equipment. I even tried some personal training. The main issue with this location is it's too small. I go in the morning to avoid the crowds and even then I have to wait to use the equipment.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jacob. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. We are sorry you found it a little busy. Feel free to stop by the office if you have any questions during your workouts.   - Gold's Gym West Broadway Team.

places.name: Gold's Gym University Market Place
places.address: Gold's Gym University Market Place, 2155 Allison Rd, Vancouver, BC V6T 1T5

featured_reviews.review_id: The parking lot in the basement, especially this spot has no "do not back in" sign although the spot next to it has it. Don't back in on that spot. The yellow frame is not visible on the rear mirror nor the camera when you back up. That's the bad part about this gym. Gym itself is good though. But there goes my 800 dollars.
featured_reviews.review_text: The parking lot in the basement, especially this spot has no "do not back in" sign although the spot next to it has it. Don't back in on that spot. The yellow frame is not visible on the rear mirror nor the camera when you back up. That's the bad part about this gym. Gym itself is good though. But there goes my 800 dollars.

featured_reviews.review_id: I have been working out for almost 9 months with the Gold's Gym University Market Place and It has satisfied my expectations so far. There are drawbacks that if it could be addressed, I'd be happier. 1- for a reason they removed the paper towels from the men's locker room and the hand dryer is the noisiest dryer that I have ever seen. 2- More bench presses are needed. I always need to wait a long time to do a bench press.

featured_reviews.review_id: Outdated equipment, horrible staff except for a few, no maintenance work, too busy with too many dumb annoying students wanting attention on social media for their lackluster workouts & the guys are insufferable simps that need to talk to & bother everyone for self benefit with no self awareness & a ton of half naked women giving each workout 25 percent at best & 100 percent "look at me but don't approach me vibes." Place is a Effing joke. Do not expect to meet good people. Nice people have agendas too & they will talk to you & suck the soul out of every workout you try to do.

featured_reviews.review_id:
A great gym with good equipment and friendly staff. The main reason for the review is to flag how helpful Yash Modi was for myself and my partner. As a member of the gym's staff, he was incredibly friendly, informative and provided great advice around membership.

Would recommend asking for him if you're looking for membership information.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Rupert. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold's Gym University Market Place Team.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Honestly this place doesn't even deserve one star.
Here is the thing. I've heard golds gym ages ago also had an amazing tour in LA's where the staffs are also super friendly.Since i have membership with good life i didn't know the golds gym is also running business in Canada. So recently I've booked a free one day pass and really looking forward.After 1hr drive from where i live to UBC golds gym( they have four locations, UBC,west broadway. Langley and another i couldn't remember). I planned to go for a run after work out so i chose ubc one. Ok direct to the point now. I was told unfortunately I'm not allowed to work out here cuz i don't live near by within 10km or you can become the membership with us then i asked them to prove that regulation cuz i wouldn't even come if i saw this information. Then they showed me a sentence on the website says must be local resident. Please tell me how to define LOCAL. No matter which location i chose will be out of 10km. At the end i was told either pay 15 bucks or leave. Really don't wanna ruined my day so i paid. Booked a one day free pass turns out been charged. Hilarious. Besides that. All the equipments are super old. Oldies but not goodies.

featured_reviews.review_id: Golds gym has an amazing environment for people anywhere along their gym journey. The staff are really friendly. The fitness consultant shaiyan has a lot of knowledge and gives great tips to plan my workout.
featured_reviews.review_text: Golds gym has an amazing environment for people anywhere along their gym journey. The staff are really friendly. The fitness consultant shaiyan has a lot of knowledge and gives great tips to plan my workout.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Advay. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Gold's Gym University Market Place Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff are really nice and pleasant. There is a good variety of free weights and machines. The negative is waiting for weeks for a machine to get repaired. For a name like Golds, customers shouldn't have to wait weeks for repairs. Currently, the leg press, biceps curls, and bench are all down. Otherwise, its a solid gym.
featured_reviews.review_text: The staff are really nice and pleasant. There is a good variety of free weights and machines. The negative is waiting for weeks for a machine to get repaired. For a name like Golds, customers shouldn't have to wait weeks for repairs. Currently, the leg press, biceps curls, and bench are all down. Otherwise, its a solid gym.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, John. We put great effort into creating positive member experiences, and we're sorry to hear that we missed the mark here. We hope to ensure a positive experience with us moving forward. Thank you, Gold's Gym University Market Place Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: the customer service here was amazing: front desk was super receptive even though I was new to this gym! Will definitely be considering joining :)

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Nikita. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Gold's Gym University Market Place. Kindly, Gold's Gym University Market Place Team.
